name: Dragonslayer
overview: Dragon Slayer was intended to be a sort of Psygnosis Barbarian type of game from Linel, with very large characters wandering around rooms, and hundreds of locations in villages, forests and the castle (which itself would have 300 rooms). The only way to stop the dragon’s reign is for one particularly brave adventurer to locate the shattered segments of a medallion, access the dragon’s lair and wipe it out. In July of 2020 it was revealed that it will finally be released at some point in the ear future as a complete rebuild by one of the original programmers named as Christian Haller.
